data.title: The alchemists
data.meta_description: A scientific and technological revolution is sweeping through the pharmaceutical industry. The result, writes Geoffrey Carr, will be better medicines—and very different drug companies | Special report
data.text:
A scientific and technological revolution is sweeping through the pharmaceutical industry. The result, writes Geoffrey Carr, will be better medicines—and very different drug companies

Feb 19th 1998|

This article appeared in the Special report section of the print edition under the headline “The alchemists”
